wikipedia_page.main: Betty Lockwood, Baroness Lockwood (22 January 1924 – 29 April 2019) was a Labour Party activist. She was heavily involved in promoting equal opportunities for women on a national and international level.

response: *Betty Lockwood, Baroness Lockwood (born 1924), politician and activist for women's rights.
* 22 January – Betty Lockwood, Baroness Lockwood, English academic and politician (died 2019)
**Betty Lockwood, Baroness Lockwood, 95, political activist and life peer, Member of the House of Lords (1978–2007).
